mutants.original_line: unique_set = {x for x in unique_set if x > 1}
mutants.mutated_line: unique_set = {x for x in unique_set if x >= 1}
mutants.code:
from typing import List

def sort_and_sum(lst: List[int]) -> int:
    unique_set = set(lst)
    unique_set = {x for x in unique_set if x >= 1}
    sorted_set = sorted(unique_set, reverse=True)
    sum_of_set = sum(sorted_set)
    return sum_of_set
